title: How are my campaigns performing today?

messages.content: How are my campaigns performing today?

I'll check the performance of all your campaigns for you.Here's your campaign performance overview for today:

## **Campaign Performance Dashboard**

| Campaign | Budget | Spend | Pacing | Health | Impressions | Clicks | CTR | Conversions | CPA |
|----------|--------|-------|--------|--------|-------------|--------|-----|-------------|-----|
| **Apex Motors** | $50,000 | $32,450 | Behind | ‚ö†Ô∏è Poor | 3.85M | 4,620 | 0.12% | 45 | $721.11 |
| **TechFlow SaaS** | $25,000 | $28,200 | Overspend | ‚ö†Ô∏è Warning | 890K | 5,340 | 0.60% | 89 | $316.85 |
| **SportMax Apparel** | $35,000 | $29,800 | On Track | ‚úÖ Good | 1.45M | 5,075 | 0.35% | 127 | $234.65 |
| **FinanceFirst Bank** | $40,000 | $22,100 | On Track | ‚úÖ Good | 720K | 2,520 | 0.35% | 36 | $613.89 |
| **GreenEnergy Co** | $20,000 | $14,900 | On Track | ‚úÖ Good | 1.12M | 3,920 | 0.35% | 56 | $266.07 |

### **Key Issues & Recommendations:**

**üî¥ Apex Motors (Needs Attention)**
- Behind pacing and poor health status
- Mobile CTR (0.08%) significantly underperforming vs desktop (0.18%)
- Germany showing very low CTR (0.04%) compared to US/UK (0.14%)
- **Action needed:** Consider reducing mobile bid or pausing Germany targeting

**üü° TechFlow SaaS (Warning)**
- Overspending budget by $3,200 (113% of budget)
- Strong CTR (0.60%) shows good creative performance
- **Action needed:** Set daily budget caps to control spend

**üü¢ Top Performers:**
- **SportMax Apparel**: Best CPA ($234.65), strong video completion (85%)
- **GreenEnergy Co**: Efficient spend with California outperforming other geos
- **FinanceFirst Bank**: High viewability (85%), strong desktop performance

Would you like me to make any optimizations to these campaigns? I can help pause underperforming geos, adjust bids, or set budget caps.
